name: MIDAS
description: AI-powered medical image diagnostics assistance system with advanced machine learning for healthcare
keyFeatures: DICOM & JPEG Support - Comprehensive medical image format compatibility
Advanced Image Preprocessing - Sophisticated image enhancement capabilities
ROI Extraction Algorithms - Automated region of interest identification
CNN & SVM Classification - Advanced machine learning for diagnosis support
clientValue: Diagnostic Time Reduction - Faster image analysis and interpretation
Detection Accuracy Enhancement - Improved diagnostic precision
Patient Outcome Improvement - Better healthcare delivery through AI assistance
Workflow Integration - Seamless integration with existing radiology workflows
businessImpactMetrics: Better healthcare delivery through AI assistance
Seamless integration with existing radiology workflows
